data.caption: Capital Expenditure For A Greenfield Project - New Product Launch
data.news_body: Endurance Technologies Limited is informing you that the Company is setting up a new facility for which capex of ~Rs. 473 million is envisaged. The plant is being set up by the Company at Mindewadi Taluka Maval District Pune Maharashtra to manufacture Lithium Ion Battery Packs of various configurations suitable for my applications  and for battery energy storage systems for other applications.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Updates on Acquisition
data.news_body:
In continuation to the intimation given by the Company on 12th December 2024 regarding signing of the Share Purchase Agreement ("SPA") by Endurance Overseas SpA subsidiary of the Company to inter alia acquire 60% stake in Stoferle GmbH and Stoferle Automotive GmbH Germany (" Target Companies") respectively we further inform pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations that the last approval of Antitrust authorities for abovementioned acquisition has been received by Endurance Overseas SpA.

Accordingly Endurance Overseas SpA has today  i.e. 2nd April 2025 completed the formalities for acquisition of 60% stake in the Target Companies as per SPA and paid the agreed consideration of 37.74 million Euros. With this the Target Companies have now become direct subsidiaries of the Company.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Endurance Technologies Limited has informed that in terms of the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 and the Companys Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading ("PIT Code") the trading window shall remain closed from Tuesday 1st April 2025 up to 48 hours after the announcement of the financial results i.e. Saturday 17th May 2025 (both days inclusive).

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
We inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company, at its meeting held today
i.e. on 17th May, 2023, considered and approved, inter alia, the following items of
business:
1. Audited financial statements, both standalone and consolidated, for the quarter
and financial year ended 31st March, 2023.
2. Recommended dividend of Rs. 7 per equity share of face value of Rs. 10 each
(70%), for the financial year 2022-23.
3. The Twenty Fourth Annual General Meeting ('AGM') of the Members of the
Company will be held on Wednesday, 23rd August, 2023. The Register of
Members and Share Transfer Books will remain closed from 12th August, 2023
to 23rd August, 2023 (both days inclusive) for determining the shareholders
entitled for aforesaid dividend.

data.caption: Audited Financial Statements, Both Standalone And Consolidated, For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended 31St March, 2023
data.news_body:
We inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company, at its meeting held today i.e. on 17th May, 2023, considered and approved, inter alia,

1. Audited financial statements, both standalone and consolidated, for the quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2023
2. Recommended dividend of Rs. 7 per equity share of face value of Rs. 10 each (70%), for the financial year 2022-23
3. The Twenty Fourth Annual General Meeting ('AGM') of the Members of the Company will be held on Wednesday, 23rd August, 2023.

data.news_body: Pursuant to above-referred regulation, we submit herewith disclosure of Related Party Transactions, on a consolidated basis, for the half year ended 30th September, 2022, in the format specified in the relevant accounting standard.Kindly note that the unaudited financial results for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2022 have been approved by the Board of Directors, at its meeting held on 7th November, 2022.The above disclosure shall also be available on the Company's website www.endurancegroup.com

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 7Th November, 2022.
data.news_body:
We inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company, at its meeting held today i.e. 7th November, 2022, has approved the unaudited financial results, both standalone and consolidated, for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2022 (''Financial Results'').

Pursuant to above-referred regulations, we enclose the following documents:
a) Statement of Financial Results;
b) ''Limited Review'' reports of the Statutory Auditors on the aforesaid Financial Results; and
c) Press Release giving highlights of the Financial Results.

The meeting commenced at 2.15 p.m. and concluded at 7.30 p.m.

The above information will be made available on the website of the Company www.endurancegroup.com.

You are requested to take the above information on record.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions Under Regulation 23(9) Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 For The Half Year Ended 31St March, 2022.
data.news_body: Pursuant to regulation 23(9) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we submit herewith disclosure of Related Party Transactions, on a consolidated basis, for the half year ended 31st March, 2022, in the format specified under SEBI circular no. SEBI / HO / CFD / CMD1 / CIR / P/ 2021 / 662 dated 22nd November, 2021.Kindly note that the financial results for the financial year ended 31st March, 2022 have been approved by the Board of Directors, at its meeting held on 19th May, 2022and the same were published on 20th May, 2022.Kindly take the above information on record.

data.caption: Results - Financial Results For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended 31St March, 2022
data.news_body: The Board of Directors, at its meeting held today i.e. on 19/05/2022, which commenced at 2.00 p.m. and concluded at 6.25 p.m. approved, inter alia, the following items of business: (1) Audited financial results, both standalone and consolidated, for the quarter and financial year ended 31/03/2022.(2)Recommended dividend of Rs. 6.25 per equity share of face value of Rs. 10/- each (62.5%), for the financial year 2021-22. The dividend, if declared by the shareholders at the 23rd AGM, shall be paid on or after 30/08/2022 but before 22/09/2022 (3)Recommended re-appointment of M/s S R B C & CO. LLP, Chartered Accountants, (ICAI Firm Registration No: 324982E/E300003), as Statutory Auditors of the Company  for  a  second  term  of  5  consecutive  years.(4) The 23RD AGM of the Company will be held on 24/08/2022. The Register of Members and Share Transfer Books will remain closed from 13/08/2022 to 24/08/2022 for determining the shareholders entitled for aforesaid dividend.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 19Th May, 2022
data.news_body: The Board of Directors, at its meeting held today 19/05/2022, which commenced at 2 p.m. and concluded at 6.15 p.m. approved, inter alia, the following items of business (1) Audited financial results, both standalone and consolidated, for the quarter and financial year ended 31/03/2022. (2)Recommended dividend of Rs. 6.25 per equity share of face value of Rs. 10/- each (62.5%), for the financial year 2021-22. The dividend, if declared by the shareholders at the 23rd AGM, shall be paid on or after 30/08/2022 but before 22/09/2022. (3)Recommended re-appointment of S R B C & CO. LLP, Chartered Accountants, (ICAI Firm Registration No: 324982E/E300003), as Statutory Auditors of the Company for a second term of five consecutive years. (4) The 23rd AGM will be held on 24/08/2022. The Register of Members and Share Transfer Books will remain closed from 13/08/2022 to 24/08/2022 (both days inclusive) for determining the shareholders entitled for aforesaid dividend.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: We inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company, at its meeting held today i.e. on 19/05/2021, which commenced at 2.15 p.m. and concluded at 4.55 p.m. considered and approved, inter alia, the following items of business (1) Audited financial results, for the quarter and financial year ended 31/03/2021.(2) Recommended dividend of Rs. 6.00 per equity share of face value of Rs. 10/- each (60%), for the financial year 2020-21. (3) The AGM of the Members of the Company will be held on Wednesday, 25/08/2021. The Register of Members and Share Transfer Books will remain closed from Saturday, 14/08/2021 to Wednesday, 25/08/2021 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of AGM and determining the shareholders entitled for aforesaid dividend.(4)Re-constitution of Committees of the Board - Mr. Indrajit Banerjee has been appointed as (i) Chairman of the Audit Committee; and (ii) ii. Member of the Risk Management Committee
